cloud_migration.name: Cloud Migration Strategy
cloud_migration.objective: Definition of a main strategy to migrate workloads to cloud from ompremise applications with focus in modernization of applications avoiding osolescense and reduce the cos of IT services.

IT efficiency.name: Improve IT efficiency in a Banking Company
IT efficiency.objective: Define a strategy to get efficiencies and reducing costs in IT services by reducing costs without compromising the quality of services.
